column4: hi, if I use envy to install the nvidia driver on gutsy, will that install the newest available release from the nvidia site?
I think it will install the one that envy-ng was release with

is that the newest nvidia one though? I have to use envy legacy because i'm using gutsy, which is quite an old release, so i don't wanna use it if it'll install the driver that was current when envy legacy came out
I'm not sure you should be using the old envy.. it was kind of bad.. could mess up your entire system and so on
